languages.text: "Вселенная исполнена ужаса. Нас окружают козни Архиврага и ксеносы, отрицающие наше право на существование. Угроза немыслима, и слабость людская не поможет нам отвратить ее. Если человек бессилен, я избавляю его от безволия и слабости, наделяя священной узостью ума и истребляя все, что не дает ему употребить всего себя на служение Империуму".

"The universe is a terrifying place. We are surrounded by the Archenemy's machinations and xenos scum who would deny us our right to exist. The threat is inconceivable, and human weakness will not help us avert it. If man is weak, I rid him of his spinelessness and feebleness, endowing him with a sacred narrowness of mind and eradicating all that prevents him from utilising his whole self in the service of the Imperium."
languages.original_text: "Вселенная исполнена ужаса. Нас окружают козни Архиврага и ксеносы, отрицающие наше право на существование. Угроза немыслима, и слабость людская не поможет нам отвратить ее. Если человек бессилен, я избавляю его от безволия и слабости, наделяя священной узостью ума и истребляя все, что не дает ему употребить всего себя на служение Империуму".

traits.locale_text: "The universe is a place of terror. We are surrounded by the Archenemy's machinations and xenos scum who would deny us our right to existence. The threat is inconceivable, and only inconceivable cruelty can shield us from it. We fight in the name of Humanity. We have no right to show mercy."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “宇宙中充满了恐怖之物，我们被混沌大敌的阴谋与该死的异形人渣包围其中。他们对我们构成了难以想象的威胁，打算剥夺我们生存的权利。既然人类软弱不堪，无法战胜这种威胁，那我就愿意帮助人类摆脱软弱与怯懦，赋予他们神圣而专注的思想，根除一切妨碍他们服侍帝国的因素。”
languages.original_text: "The universe is a terrifying place. We are surrounded by the Archenemy's machinations and xenos scum who would deny us our right to exist. The threat is inconceivable, and human weakness will not help us avert it. If man is weak, I rid him of his spinelessness and feebleness, endowing him with a sacred narrowness of mind and eradicating all that prevents him from utilising his whole self in the service of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “宇宙中充满了恐怖之物，我们被混沌大敌的阴谋与该死的异形人渣包围其中。他们对我们构成了难以想象的威胁，打算剥夺我们生存的权利。既然人类软弱不堪，无法战胜这种威胁，那我就愿意帮助人类摆脱软弱与怯懦，赋予他们神圣而专注的思想，根除一切妨碍他们服侍帝国的因素。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「宇宙は恐ろしい場所だ。我々は渾沌の勢力の策略と、我々の存在権を否定する異種族のクズどもに囲まれている。脅威は想像を絶するものであり、人間の弱さではそれを回避することはできない。もし人間が弱いというのであれば、私はその無気力と弱さを取り除き、神聖なる狭量さを与授け、帝国の奉仕へと己のすべてを捧げることを妨げるあらゆるものを根絶しよう」
languages.original_text: "The universe is a terrifying place. We are surrounded by the Archenemy's machinations and xenos scum who would deny us our right to exist. The threat is inconceivable, and human weakness will not help us avert it. If man is weak, I rid him of his spinelessness and feebleness, endowing him with a sacred narrowness of mind and eradicating all that prevents him from utilising his whole self in the service of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「宇宙は恐ろしい場所だ。我々は渾沌の勢力の策略と、我々の存在権を否定する異種族のクズどもに囲まれている。脅威は想像を絶するものであり、人間の弱さではそれを回避することはできない。もし人間が弱いというのであれば、私はその無気力と弱さを取り除き、神聖なる狭量さを与授け、帝国の奉仕へと己のすべてを捧げることを妨げるあらゆるものを根絶しよう」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «El universo es un lugar aterrador. Nos rodean las maquinaciones del Archienemigo y la escoria xenos, dispuesta a negarnos nuestro derecho a existir. La amenaza es inconcebible y la debilidad humana no nos ayudará a detenerla. Si un hombre es débil, le libro de su debilidad y su falta de moral, dotándole de una bendita estrechez de miras y erradicando todo cuanto le impide dedicarse en cuerpo y alma al servicio del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "The universe is a terrifying place. We are surrounded by the Archenemy's machinations and xenos scum who would deny us our right to exist. The threat is inconceivable, and human weakness will not help us avert it. If man is weak, I rid him of his spinelessness and feebleness, endowing him with a sacred narrowness of mind and eradicating all that prevents him from utilising his whole self in the service of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: «El universo es un lugar aterrador. Nos rodean las maquinaciones del Archienemigo y la escoria xenos, dispuesta a negarnos nuestro derecho a existir. La amenaza es inconcebible y la debilidad humana no nos ayudará a detenerla. Si un hombre es débil, le libro de su debilidad y su falta de moral, dotándole de una bendita estrechez de miras y erradicando todo cuanto le impide dedicarse en cuerpo y alma al servicio del Imperium».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Das Universum ist ein Furcht erregender Ort. Wir sind umgeben von den Intrigen des Erzfeindes und von Xenos-Abschaum, der uns unser Existenzrecht abspricht. Die Gefahr ist unermesslich und menschliche Schwäche wird uns nicht helfen, sie zu bannen. Ist ein Mann schwach, befreie ich ihn von seiner Willensschwäche und Rückgratlosigkeit, ehe ich ihm eine heilige Beschränktheit des Geistes gewähre und alles tilge, was ihn davon abhält, sein ganzes Selbst in den Dienst des Imperiums zu stellen."
languages.original_text: "The universe is a terrifying place. We are surrounded by the Archenemy's machinations and xenos scum who would deny us our right to exist. The threat is inconceivable, and human weakness will not help us avert it. If man is weak, I rid him of his spinelessness and feebleness, endowing him with a sacred narrowness of mind and eradicating all that prevents him from utilising his whole self in the service of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Das Universum ist ein Ort des Schreckens. Wir sind umgeben von den Machenschaften des Erzfeindes und von Xenos-Abschaum, der uns unser Existenzrecht abspricht. Die Gefahr ist unfassbar, und nur unfassbare Grausamkeit kann uns vor ihr bewahren. Wir kämpfen im Namen der Menschheit. Wir haben kein Recht, Gnade zu zeigen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « L'univers est un lieu terrifiant. Nous sommes cernés par les machinations du Grand Ennemi et par ces ignobles xénos qui veulent nous refuser le droit d'exister. La menace est d'une ampleur inconcevable, et la faiblesse humaine ne nous sera d'aucune utilité pour y faire face. Si l'homme est faible, alors il est de mon devoir de le débarrasser de sa couardise et de sa médiocrité et de le doter d'une étroitesse d'esprit sacrée tout en éradiquant tout ce qui pourrait l'empêcher de se vouer corps et âme à l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "The universe is a terrifying place. We are surrounded by the Archenemy's machinations and xenos scum who would deny us our right to exist. The threat is inconceivable, and human weakness will not help us avert it. If man is weak, I rid him of his spinelessness and feebleness, endowing him with a sacred narrowness of mind and eradicating all that prevents him from utilising his whole self in the service of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: « L'univers est un lieu terrifiant. Nous sommes cernés par les machinations du Grand Ennemi et par ces ignobles xénos qui veulent nous refuser le droit d'exister. La menace est d'une ampleur inconcevable, et la faiblesse humaine ne nous sera d'aucune utilité pour y faire face. Si l'homme est faible, alors il est de mon devoir de le débarrasser de sa couardise et de sa médiocrité et de le doter d'une étroitesse d'esprit sacrée tout en éradiquant tout ce qui pourrait l'empêcher de se vouer corps et âme à l'Imperium. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Evren, dehşet verici bir yer. Şerbaşı'nın makinatörleri ve adi zenolar etrafımızı sarmış, yaşama hakkımızı inkâr ediyorlar. Ortada akılalmaz bir tehdit var. İnsan doğamızın zayıflığı da hiç işimize yaramıyor. Bir kimse zayıfsa onu omurgasızlığından ve saflığından kurtarır, zihnini cehaletle kutsar ve İmparatorluk'a tüm benliğiyle hizmet etmesini önleyen her şeyi yok ederim."
languages.original_text: "The universe is a terrifying place. We are surrounded by the Archenemy's machinations and xenos scum who would deny us our right to exist. The threat is inconceivable, and human weakness will not help us avert it. If man is weak, I rid him of his spinelessness and feebleness, endowing him with a sacred narrowness of mind and eradicating all that prevents him from utilising his whole self in the service of the Imperium."
